title: What are the latest technologies that IT companies require in employees nowadays? - Quora

response.answer_text: The tech employment opportunities are expected to rise by 12% by 2024. New jobs will be available to IT professionals who are looking to explore more into this field. The exponential growth in the competition is going to make it harder for the candidates to acquire a skilled job. Your approach towards polishing your skill set is going to make the ball roll in your court. From strong communication skills to your experience in latest technologies, here are all the skills you should acquire to be become an essential part of an IT Company. Data Science Over the last few years, Data Science has changed the concept of technology. From finance and banking to Health care and drug discovery, Data Science is being used everywhere. McKinsey predicts that the demand for data scientists is increasing so quickly that by 2018, there will be a 50 percent gap in the demand and supply of Data Scientists. Experience with AI Here are some of the reason why learning AI is important # AI adapts through progressive learning algorithms # AI adds intelligence #AI is incredibly accurate #AI analyses more data deeply # AI automates learning and data discovery The list is too long for me to put it here. But AI has reformed the world to a whole new level. Everything we use in our daily life is somehow a part of AI. Polishing your skills on AI will fetch you great results. Augmented Reality The demand for products supporting Augmented Reality technology is gaining new heights. Chris Kirby of Welcome to the #1 Marketplace for Voice Over Talent says that the people with the skills to invasion, design and develop applications with the advantage of AR, will be in high demand. Mobile App Development From small business to the giants, everybody is in need of an application that would help their business to grow. The time, where everyone needs the product and services to get delivered to their footsteps, not learning App Development will be considered a foolish move. Cloud Computing Cloud Computing is a technology that uses Internet and central remote servers to maintain data and applications. Cloud Computing is becoming the new norm. 70 percent of today’s business is moving towards Cloud services for better performance and structure. Learning Cloud Computing will help you big time! Good luck with the future!

This is a tough question to answer and depends on the perspective of the person answering. The role of an IT company is changing. Initially it used to be that the client comes up with a requirement including a functional document and the IT team used to program. Now - clients come up with a business problem statement and the IT team along with functional experts need to come up with a solution. Conceptualizing solutions end up using multiple technologies. Companies now want employees to be strong in principles of software engineering and programming and would like employees to use the right tool for the particular problem statement. Based on demand and supply : today we have lesser employees with skills in technologies like React-Native, Golang, Game Programming, Leveraging Cloud, IT Security. This may shift to another in the next day or fortnight. On another note - employees with background in C++ have a distinct advantage in the coming days as tech requirements is now shifting to AR/VR, Blockchain, Embedded and developing high performance applications.
